name: FENIXTFTWIFI
0:
”Alexa, set the living room to 25 degrees for 30 minutes”
”Alexa, set the living room to off mode”
”Alexa, increase temperature in the living room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill manages the room temperature, the setpoint and the different modes of the FENIX TFT WIFI thermostats installed in your house. 

You can get the room temperature of your room:
"Alexa, what is the temperature in the living room?"

Or change the operating mode of your thermostat:
"Alexa, set the living room to 25 degrees"
"Alexa, set the living room to off"
"Alexa, set the living room to automatic mode"
"Alexa, set the living room to heating mode"

You can also specify a time (corresponds to the Timer mode in the Fenix app):
"Alexa, set the living room to 25 degrees for 30 minutes"

Correspondence of heating modes:
- Heating mode on Alexa = Manual mode on the Fenix app
- Auto mode on Alexa = Program mode on the Fenix application
- Off mode on Alexa = Off mode on Fenix app
- Set temperature + time on Alexa = Timer mode on Fenix app


To control your thermostats with Alexa, you must link your Fenix TFT WiFi account with Alexa:
- Enable the Skill in the Alexa app and log in with the same credentials you use in the Fenix TFT WiFi app
- The Alexa app asks you to search for new devices, press the "detect my devices" button.
- Your Fenix thermostats will appear in the Alexa application!
